
[[/Image:gui-radiobutton.png.md|frame|Example GUI radio buttons.]]
The GUI radio button class represents GUI radio buttons in MTA's GUI system. These can be checked or unchecked and work quite similiar as the GUI [[/Element/GUI/Checkbox.md|checkboxes]].

The element type of this class is '''"gui-radiobutton"'''.
